title: Enhanced Feature Extraction and Selection
description: Develop advanced feature extraction and selection methods to capture the most relevant information from EEG signals.

examples.description: Introduces ACF-GCN, which enhances feature extraction through attention mechanisms and graph-based learning.
examples.note: Added for its introduction of ACF-GCN, enhancing feature extraction through attention mechanisms and graph-based learning.

examples.description: Proposes an embedded feature selection algorithm for efficient dimensionality reduction.
examples.note: Added for its proposal of an embedded feature selection algorithm, relevant for efficient dimensionality reduction in EEG analysis.

examples.description: Combines statistical and deep learning features for enhanced EEG-based drowsiness detection.
examples.note: Added for its combination of statistical and deep learning features, contributing to enhanced EEG-based drowsiness detection.

examples.description: Focuses on capturing inter-channel relations and uses a capsule network for improved feature learning under limited data.
examples.note: Added for its focus on capturing inter-channel relations and using a capsule network, relevant for improved feature learning with limited EEG data.

examples.description: Combines SL and MST for effective feature extraction and classification in driver drowsiness detection.
examples.note: Added for its combination of SL and MST for effective feature extraction and classification, relevant for driver drowsiness detection.

examples.description: Focuses on feature extraction from EEG and gyroscope data for early driver drowsiness detection.

examples.description: Employs CNN for feature extraction from EEG signals, tailored to capture essential EEG frequencies related to alertness and drowsiness.
examples.note: Added for its employment of CNN for feature extraction, tailored to capture essential EEG frequencies related to alertness and drowsiness.

examples.description: Focuses on feature extraction from cross-subject data using CNNs, with an emphasis on discovering shared EEG features indicative of driver drowsiness.
examples.note: Added for its focus on feature extraction from cross-subject data using CNNs, relevant for discovering shared EEG features indicative of driver drowsiness.

examples.description: Utilizes a novel interpretation technique for feature analysis in an interpretable CNN architecture.
examples.note: Added for its utilization of a novel interpretation technique for feature analysis, relevant for an interpretable CNN architecture.

examples.description: Focuses on feature extraction and the impact of hyperparameter tuning on classification accuracy.
examples.note: Added for its emphasis on feature extraction and the impact of hyperparameter tuning, relevant for enhancing classification accuracy in fatigue detection.

examples.description: Emphasizes feature extraction combining machine learning algorithms with spatial factors derived from EEG data.

examples.description: Employs a separable CNN for feature extraction from EEG data, focusing on both spatial and temporal aspects.
examples.note: Added for its employment of a separable CNN for feature extraction, relevant for analyzing both spatial and temporal aspects of EEG data in fatigue detection.

examples.description: Focuses on feature extraction from EEG and ECG signals using a fusion-separation mechanism in the PFCN model.
examples.note: Added for its focus on feature extraction from both EEG and ECG signals, relevant for a multimodal approach to fatigue detection.

examples.description: Emphasizes feature extraction using a dual-graph approach, with both time-frequency characteristics via Pearson correlation and magnitude-squared coherence.
examples.note: Added for its emphasis on feature extraction using a dual-graph approach, relevant for capturing time-frequency characteristics in fatigue detection.

trend: Development of feature extraction techniques tailored for multi-modal EEG analysis and fatigue detection.
